ygData.subject: RE: [cantera] Using an adiabatic freely propagating flame solution as an initial guess
ygData.msgSnippet: It works now , I just had forgotten to set the gas state after restoring the solution : gas.setState_TPX(tinlet, p, comp) Laurent ... From: Benezech, Laurent
